text: Mark Alexander Milley (born June 18, 1958) is a United States Army general. He was the 20th chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff from 2019 until 2023. He was the 39th Chief of Staff of the United States Army. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:People from Winchester, Massachusetts Category:Military people from Massachusetts Category:Chairmen of the Joint Chiefs of Staff
title: Mark Milley
